GifHeaderParser

open class GifHeaderParser
Content copied to clipboard

A class responsible for creating com.bumptech.glide.gifdecoder.GifHeaders from data representing animated GIFs.

See also

<a href="https://www.w3.org/Graphics/GIF/spec-gif89a.txt">GIF 89a Specification</a>

open fun isAnimated(): Boolean
Content copied to clipboard
Determines if the GIF is animated by trying to read in the first 2 frames This method re-parses the data even if the header has already been read.
